# Generate Chat Completion

# Description

Given a user prompt and additional options, this activity generates a text completion response. For details, refer to Create Chat Completion API.

# Project compatibility

Windows | Cross-platform

# Configuration

* 
* Prompt - The input to use for the chat completion request. This field supports String type input.
* Model - Select the AI model used for generating a response.







* Generate chat completion - Automatically generated output variable
* Generated text - The top generated chat completion string.
* Reasoning content - Provide reasoning for the model's response applicable to reasoner.
